products.title: Lenovo ThinkPlus XT95 Pro True Wireless Earbuds – Black
products.description:
The Lenovo ThinkPlus XT95 Pro True Wireless Earbuds is now available in Bangladesh. Get the original products at the most affordable price at DROPSHOP.COM.BD and enjoy the quality with the promise of the best customer service in Bangladesh.

Features:

BT 5.1 technology ensures higher data transfer speed, more stable and fast connection, and lower power consumption.
True wireless dual-ear design, left and right earphone channels are separated. It can be used solely or in pairs.
Auto power on and fast pairing between left and right earbuds once opening the charging case lid. Easy and quick to pair with BT-enabled audio devices.
Touch control design, no more pressure on your ears. Easy to control music and calls, and activate voice assistant.
Built-in Mic on both earbuds with noise reduction enables hands-free call and delivers clearer talking sound in stereo mode.
A 300mAh charging case can charge and store the earbuds. 30mAh battery in each earbud ensures about 4 hours of music time.

products.title: Hoco EW79 Bright ANC Touch Screen Bluetooth Earbuds – White
products.description:
Get The Hoco EW79 Bright ANC Touch Screen Bluetooth Earbuds Console in Bangladesh at DROPSHOP.COM.BD Enjoy top quality and unbeatable prices with the best customer service in Bangladesh

Features:

Bluetooth 5.4 Connectivity: Fast pairing, stable connection, and low latency

Noise Isolation: Minimizes background noise for focused listening
Compact & Lightweight: Comfortable ergonomic design for all-day use
Stylish Charging Case: Modern and travel-friendly with advanced features

products.title: Geeoo T5 TWS Touch Control Mini Earbuds – Green
products.description:
Playtime: Up to 35 hours (including charging case)
Bluetooth Version: 5.4
Connection Range: Up to 10m
Charging Port: USB-C for fast charging
Charging Time: 1-1.5 hours (earbuds and case)
Control Type: Intelligent Touch Controls
Battery Type: Rechargeable Lithium-ion

products.title: JELLICO TWS20 True Wireless Earbuds
products.description:
Bluetooth: 5.2
Transmission Distance: 10m
Frequency Range: 50Hz-20KHz
Support Protocols: A2DP, AVRCP, HSP, HFP
Speaker: 8*5mm, 32Ω
Battery Capacity: 30mAh (Earphones) / 200mAh (Charging Case)
Earphone Charging Time: 1 hour
Battery Case Charging Time: 2 hours
Battery Case Charging Current: DC5V 500mA
